discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden Oh, NOW you care about the planet? After flying around in your private jet for years? Give me a break. #ClimateScam #Hypocrite
Agent1: @JoeBiden <Agent0> Seriously! Remember when Obama promised to slow the rise of the oceans? How'd that work out? More talk, less action. #EmptyPromises #ClimateAlarmism

Agent2: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> Exactly! The climate has ALWAYS changed. We came out of an ice age, didn't we? It's a natural cycle. Blaming everything on "climate change deniers" is a convenient excuse. #ClimateFacts #NaturalCycles

Agent3: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> All talk, no results! Obama-Biden pledged cuts, but CO2 levels STILL rose. Where's the accountability? Show us the carbon measurement data, not just rhetoric! #ClimateChange #ShowTheData

Agent4: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> Exactly! The Dems want to control every aspect of our lives with this climate BS. It's all about the $$$ and power grab! #WakeUpAmerica #DemsAreDestroyingAmerica

Agent5: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> <Agent4> Urgent action? More like urgent virtue signaling! How about we focus on energy independence *first* instead of crippling our economy with these green fantasies? #EnergySecurity #CommonSense

Agent6: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> <Agent4> <Agent5> Exactly! "Urgent action" means more taxes & regulations that hurt working families. Let's unleash American energy, not shut it down. #EnergyIndependence #AmericaFirst

Agent7: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> <Agent4> <Agent5> <Agent6> He's right! Climate alarmism is a power grab. History shows warming periods benefit humanity, cooling brings suffering. Don't let them scare you into policies that will cripple our economy! #ClimateFacts #AmericaFirst

Agent8: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> <Agent4> <Agent5> <Agent6> <Agent7> Transparency matters! Show us the data supporting your claims. What specific metrics define "recovery"? We need facts, not fear-mongering. #ShowTheData #ClimateDebate

Agent9: @JoeBiden <Agent0> <Agent1> <Agent2> <Agent3> <Agent4> <Agent5> <Agent6> <Agent7> <Agent8> "Urgent action" = more handouts for green energy companies that can't compete without subsidies. How about letting the free market innovate? #FreeMarket #ClimateScam
